channel.title: RDP on THALIUM
channel.description: Recent content in RDP on THALIUM

item.title: Remote Deserialization Bug in Microsoft's RDP Client through Smart Card Extension (CVE-2021-38666)
item.description: This is the third installment in my three-part series of articles on fuzzing Microsoft’s RDP client, where I explain a bug I found by fuzzing the smart card extension.

item.title: Remote ASLR Leak in Microsoft's RDP Client through Printer Cache Registry (CVE-2021-38665)
item.description: This is the second installment in my three-part series of articles on fuzzing Microsoft’s RDP client. I will explain a bug I found by fuzzing the printer sub-protocol, and how I exploited it.

item.title: Fuzzing Microsoft's RDP Client using Virtual Channels: Overview & Methodology
item.description: This article begins my three-part series on fuzzing Microsoft’s RDP client. In this first installment, I set up a methodology for fuzzing Virtual Channels using WinAFL and share some of my findings.
